entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
